Language.Sentence: Order of rendering the object on the page
Position in visual hierarchy of objects
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object in pixels
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object in pixels
Width of the object in pixels
Height of the object in pixels, no more than 2880
Container id which will be copied into pdf
Measurement unit to be used when coordinates are specified. One of "pt" (points), "mm" (Default), "cm", "in"

One of 'pageFormats' in pt. Use Parent to have sizes of copied container. Below as available formats in pt: pageFormats list = [ // Size in pt of various paper formats 'a0', 'a1', 'a2', 'a3', 'a4', 'a5', 'a6', 'a7', 'a8', 'a9', 'a10', 'b0', 'b1', 'b2', 'b3', 'b4', 'b5', 'b6', 'b7', 'b8', 'b9', 'b10', 'c0', 'c1', 'c2', 'c3', 'c4', 'c5', 'c6', 'c7', 'c8', 'c9', 'c10', 'dl', 'letter', 'government-letter', 'legal', 'junior-legal', 'ledger', 'tabloid', 'credit-card']
The name of the CSS class.
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Will hide parent (source) container after rendering it to pdf
Move the object to a new position
Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds
X-coordinate of the new position relative to the left upper corner of the container
Y-coordinate of the new position relative to the left upper corner of the container
Visual effect of moving, time is indicated in milliseconds
